title: Baker and Spice
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Breakfast, lunch, dinner, afternoon tea. Has ovo-lacto vegetarian items. Vegans please inquire about options and inform HappyCow. Located on the Dubai Fountain across from Burj Kahlifa, with views.
